FuncDef: This command assigns a DHCP filter to the group-interface. This feature is used where the SR 7750 is the second DHCP relay or where DHCP messages are snooped for subscriber management. The filter can be used to bypass host creation, drop DHCP message, or perform no action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the DHCP filter ID for this interface. Values-1 to 65535.
